recordTypes.name: Registered License Contractor
recordTypes.description: Internal Database for Contractors. Records created here will allow you to auto-fill various permits and application in future without manually retyping a form.

recordTypes.name: Certificate Of Occupancy
recordTypes.description:
This permit is for:

Beverage Certificate of Occupancy, Restaurant Certificate of Occupancy, or Conditional Certificate of Occupancy

recordTypes.name: Temporary Use of the Right-Of-Way
recordTypes.description: This permit is required for any encroachment into the right-of-way or for non-standard alley improvements.

recordTypes.name: Major and Minor Subdivision Plat Review (RPA)
recordTypes.description:
Application to submit when applying to subdivide land for Minor (6-10 lots without infrastructure improvements) and Major (11+ lots or lots with infrastructure improvements) Plats in unicorporated Hamilton County.

PLEASE NOTE: Staff level plats (5 or less lots with NO infrastructure improvements) are not submitted here. They are still submitted to Hamilton County GIS.

recordTypes.name: Subdivision Plat Variance (RPA)
recordTypes.description: Application for a variance to a subdivision regulation.

recordTypes.name: Notice of Interest
recordTypes.description: Please complete the following form to submit your Notice of Interest in the Voluntary Incentives Program

recordTypes.name: Sign up
recordTypes.description: Create an OpenGov account

recordTypes.name: Board of Zoning Appeals (BZA)
recordTypes.description: If your project does not meet the zoning requirements, you may request a variance from the Board of Zoning Appeals.

recordTypes.name: Stormwater Variance (SWV)
recordTypes.description: Stormwater Variance (required for land disturbing activity within the water quality, riparian buffer zone(s)).

recordTypes.name: Building Code Compliance Letter
recordTypes.description: A request for a letter Building Code Compliance information for a property or properties.

recordTypes.name: Presubmittal & FBC Consulting Meeting Scheduler
recordTypes.description:
Meetings are available in one or two formats.

Virtual with Google Meet 

In-person at Development Resource Center 1250 Market Street Suite 1000

recordTypes.name: Infeasibility Request (SOV)
recordTypes.description: Stay on Volume

recordTypes.name: Temporary Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Application to have a temporary sign in the City of Chattanooga. This includes banners (over 40 square feet), special events, and relocation signs.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description:
This application is for New Construction single-unit (detached or attached), ADUs, or work altering the existing footprint.
( single-unit (detached or attached) are formerly known as Single Family Home and Duplexes )

recordTypes.name: Board of Construction Appeals (BOCA)
recordTypes.description: The Board of Construction Appeals hears requests and renders decisions for variances with respect to the City's adopted construction codes.

recordTypes.name: Land Disturbing Permit
recordTypes.description: A Land Disturbing Permit is required for the construction of all residential single-family homes, additions and out-buildings (garages, sheds, etc.), if the land is disturbed.

recordTypes.name: Residential Modification Permit
recordTypes.description: Residential Repair Replace / Alteration permit. For modifications to existing structures that don't alter the footprint. This applies to single-family units, both attached and detached, where there is a total remodel of the interior, or portions of the interior, replacing an existing deck, repairing a porch, re-roofing, windows, exterior doors, or siding replacement.

recordTypes.name: Edit your profile
recordTypes.description: Update your profile name and contact information.

recordTypes.name: How to apply for a permit, How to scedule an inspection
On-Premise Permanent Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Application submit to install or modify permanent on-premise sign in the City of Chattanooga.

recordTypes.name: Retaining Walls or Reinforced Slopes
recordTypes.description: This permit is for retaining walls and/or earth-retaining structures.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Tent Permit
recordTypes.description: A structure erected for special events or activities and used for a maximum of thirty (30) days or less upon approval by the Director of Codes Administration, to include tents or other code complying prefabricated structures.

recordTypes.name: Lot Subdivision (SBD)
recordTypes.description: Subdivision proposal and subdivision road construction

recordTypes.name: Timber Removal Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit for Commercial Timber Harvest

recordTypes.name: Tire Haulers
recordTypes.description: Ordinance # 13047 Chapter 11-Article XIX Sec. 11-493

recordTypes.name: Help Guides
recordTypes.description: Accessing Your Information

recordTypes.name: Off-Premise Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for the demolition, installation, or modification an off-premise sign in the City of Chattanooga

recordTypes.name: Revision Request
recordTypes.description:
If your project needs revisions submitted, fill out this form
Please provide a full set of drawings, divided by Architectural, Structural, Mechanical,  Electrical, Plumbing, Fire, for all revisions.

recordTypes.name: Tree Ordinance Permit
recordTypes.description: Impact to trees on city right-way or city properties.

recordTypes.name: FAQ's
recordTypes.description: Frequently Asked Questions

recordTypes.name: Short-Term Vacation Rental (STVR)
recordTypes.description: Short-Term Vacation Rental (STVR) refers to the rental of any dwelling unit or bedroom as residential accommodation for a duration of less than 30 consecutive days. Short-term rentals are allowed within certain parameters, and there are rules and regulations you must follow to legally rent out your residence on a short-term basis.

recordTypes.name: Street Cut Permit
recordTypes.description: Street cut application for general contractors.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical License Master
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the mechanical business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes installations as well as any associated repairs or alterations to mechanical equipment. (see city code 22.5-1—22.5-20).

recordTypes.name: Zoning Verification Letter
recordTypes.description: A request for one of the following letters: Zoning Verification Letter, Non-Conforming Letter, Beverage Verification Letter, or Floodplain Verification Letter.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit application applies to new construction, additions and/or alterations. For buildings or structures that are classified as industrial, institutional, educational, or commercial (including townhomes).

recordTypes.name: Plumbing License Master
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the plumbing business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes the installation of plumbing as well as any associated repairs or alterations. (see city code 27-1—27-20).

recordTypes.name: Utility Street Cut Permit
recordTypes.description: Street cut application for utility companies only.

recordTypes.name: Historic Zoning Certificate of Appropriateness (COA) Application
recordTypes.description:
Certificates of Appropriateness (COA): 
Set up a meeting with Cassie Cline, Historic Preservation Planner to review what is needed.

recordTypes.name: Gas License Master
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the gas piping business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes the installation of gas piping as well as any associated repairs or alterations. (see city code 19-1—19-122)

recordTypes.name: Commercial Repair Replace
recordTypes.description: For repairs to existing structures if minor alterations to the floor plan, footprint, or structural elements. Minor, like-in-kind replacement of any part of an existing building for its maintenance or to correct unforeseen damage. Repairs may not alter the size or location of doors, windows, or openings or alter the building's appearance, layout, or function.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for the demolition of Commercial buildings being removed from a property.

recordTypes.name: Historic Zoning Demolition Certificate of Appropriateness (COA)  Application
recordTypes.description:
Certificates of Appropriateness (COA): 
Set up a meeting with Cassie Cline, Historic Preservation Planner to review what is needed.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical License Journeyman (LMJ)
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the mechanical business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes installations as well as any associated repairs or alterations to mechanical equipment. (see city code 22.5-1—22.5-20).

recordTypes.name: Electrical License Journeyman - Chattanooga (LEJ)
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the electrical business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes installations of electrical wiring as well as any associated repairs or alterations. (see city code 1986, sec. 14-31 ).

recordTypes.name: Amplified Noise Permit
recordTypes.description: A request for a temporary event that will exceed the requirements of the Noise Ordinance.

recordTypes.name: Residential Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is for the demolition of Residential buildings (up to 4 units).

recordTypes.name: Electrical License Journeyman - State Certified
recordTypes.description: Anyone wishing to engage in the electrical business in the city must be licensed by the city of Chattanooga. This includes installations of electrical wiring as well as any associated repairs or alterations. (see city code 1986, sec. 14-31 ).

recordTypes.name: Form Based Code Major Modification Application
recordTypes.description:
Set up a meeting with a Land Development employee to review what variances are needed.

If your modification request must be heard before the Committee

recordTypes.name: Local Historic Landmark Application
recordTypes.description:
Set up a meeting with Cassie Cline, Historic Preservation Planner to review what is needed.

Please Note: Applications for Local Historic Landmarks and/or Districts will impose a moratorium on the granting of permits to demolish, construct, reconstruct, renovate, grade, or in any way alter any structures or land recommended for designation.
